disclaimer: Educational information only; not medical advice. Always read product labels and consult a qualified healthcare professional. Some supplements may interact with medications or be contraindicated for certain conditions.

routines.title: Anticoagulant-Safe

items.name: Vitamin D3
items.description: Supports calcium absorption, bone strength, and immune balance.

items.name: Magnesium
items.description: Essential mineral for energy production, muscles, nerves, and relaxation.

items.name: B-Complex
items.description: Auto-added from routines; description pending.

interactions: Avoid/caution: Ginkgo biloba, very high-dose EPA, and Melatonin (bleeding risk).
Coenzyme Q10 may reduce warfarin effect — monitor INR if used.

routines.title: Thyroid-Friendly

items.name: Vitamin D3
items.description: Supports calcium absorption, bone strength, and immune balance.

items.name: Selenium
items.description: Antioxidant trace mineral that supports thyroid function and immunity.

items.name: Magnesium
items.description: Essential mineral for energy production, muscles, nerves, and relaxation.

items.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil (EPA & DHA)
items.description: Marine omega‑3s for heart, brain, eye, and joint health.

interactions: Separate levothyroxine by ≥4h from calcium/iron/magnesium, fibers (psyllium/inulin/pectin) and soy.
Avoid Ashwagandha if thyroid condition is unstable or when on levothyroxine.

routines.title: SSRI-Friendly Focus

items.name: L-Theanine

items.name: Rhodiola Rosea
items.description: Adaptogen for fatigue resistance, mood, and mental performance.

items.name: Vitamin D3
items.description: Supports calcium absorption, bone strength, and immune balance.

items.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil (EPA & DHA)
items.description: Marine omega‑3s for heart, brain, eye, and joint health.

interactions: Limit late-day caffeine if anxious or sensitive to sleep disruption.

routines.title: Low-Stim Workout

items.name: Creatine Monohydrate
items.description: Well‑researched ergogenic aid for strength, power, and muscle mass.

items.name: Beta-Alanine
items.description: Buffers lactic acid to improve muscular endurance during high‑intensity exercise.

items.name: Whey Protein
items.description: Fast‑digesting protein ideal post‑workout for muscle repair.

items.name: Electrolyte Blend
items.description: Balanced mix of minerals to support hydration during activity.

items.name: Magnesium
items.description: Essential mineral for energy production, muscles, nerves, and relaxation.

interactions: Separate magnesium from tetracyclines/fluoroquinolones (≥2h before or 4–6h after).
If on levothyroxine, separate minerals by ≥4h.

routines.title: Sleep-Calm
routines.goal: Gentle sleep support with minimal interactions

items.name: Magnesium
items.description: Essential mineral for energy production, muscles, nerves, and relaxation.

items.name: L-Theanine
items.description: Amino acid from tea that promotes calm focus without drowsiness.

items.name: Melatonin
items.description: Helps regulate sleep–wake cycles and supports restful sleep.

interactions: Melatonin: caution with anticoagulants/antiplatelets, anticonvulsants or antihypertensives.
